However now this is how it looks like. And if you're asking what about it? This somehow cause my rocket can't go to right and left, it can rotate and go up and down but not left and right. I don't know if this is a glitch or am I missing something in the settings, if there's anybody know how to fix this, let me know
Did you change the control part of your rocket? The orientation shows that it thinks it is lying on its side with the front pointed north.
You can also change which direction a part thinks is "forward" in the right click menu.

2 hours ago, Angrasion52 said:

It's not just for this one, all of my rocket (even the one I created a long time ago) have the same problem. All of them won't go to left or right. But if I was changing my control part, how do I exactly change it again? Do I need to move it or something

to change orientation, there are some parts that you can choose as "forward". those are probe cores, crew modules, and docking ports. right click on them, "control from here", now that part is pointing forward. Some of them even have the option of pointing forward or backwards.

 

however, what you are experiencing is not normal. are you still launching rockets from the launchpad? if you're launching from the spaceplane hangar, it may make a difference. do your rockets have unusual features? I suppose not, since even the ones that used to work now have this problem.

if manually fixing orientation does not work, you may try to reinstall the game
What does the ship look like and which is its control part? Pics might help.
